Metadata.Title: Web Site Content Is Located on a Non-system NTFS Volume
Metadata.DirectLink: Web Site Content Is Located on a Non-system NTFS Volume
Metadata.Priority: J.D. Meier, Alex Mackman, Michael Dunner, Srinath Vasireddy, Ray Escamilla and Anandha Murukan

Content.Data:
What to Check For

Check to ensure that Web site content is located on a non-system NTFS volume to mitigate the risks associated with unforeseen canonicalization issues and directory traversal attacks.

How to Check

Do not use the default \inetpub\wwwroot directory. For example, if your system is installed on the C: drive, then move your site and content directory to the D: drive.

Adapted from Microsoft patterns & practices guidance.
